# 10.0 Docs

## Core .NET libraries

- [API obsoletions with non-default diagnostic IDs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/10.0/obsolete-apis.md): Learn about the APIs that have been marked as obsolete in .NET 10 with a custom diagnostic ID.
- [ActivitySource.CreateActivity and ActivitySource.StartActivity behavior change](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/10.0/activity-sampling.md): Learn about the .NET 10.0 breaking change in core .NET libraries where ActivitySource.CreateActivity and ActivitySource.StartActivity behavior is modified.
- [Arm64 SVE nonfaulting loads require mask](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/10.0/sve-nonfaulting-loads-mask-parameter.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where Arm64 SVE nonfaulting load APIs now require a mask parameter as the first argument.
- [BufferedStream.WriteByte no longer performs implicit flush](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/10.0/bufferedstream-writebyte-flush.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where BufferedStream.WriteByte no longer performs an implicit flush when the internal buffer is full.
- [C# 14 overload resolution with span parameters](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/10.0/csharp-overload-resolution.md): Learn about the .NET 10 breaking change in core .NET libraries where overloads with span parameters are applicable in more scenarios.
- [Consistent shift behavior in generic math](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/10.0/generic-math.md): Learn about the .NET 10 breaking change in core .NET libraries where shift operations in generic math now have consistent behavior.
- [Default trace context propagator updated to W3C Standard](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/10.0/default-trace-context-propagator.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where the default trace context propagator is switched from Legacy to W3C.
- [DriveInfo.DriveFormat returns Linux filesystem types](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/10.0/driveinfo-driveformat-linux.md): Learn about the .NET 10 breaking change in core .NET libraries where DriveInfo.DriveFormat on Linux systems returns Linux kernel filesystem type strings instead of mapped magic constants.
- [DynamicallyAccessedMembers annotation removed from DefaultValueAttribute ctor](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/10.0/defaultvalueattribute-dynamically-accessed-members.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where a 'DefaultValueAttribute' constructor is no longer annotated with 'DynamicallyAccessedMembers'.
- [Explicit struct Size disallowed with InlineArray](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/10.0/inlinearray-explicit-size-disallowed.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where specifying explicit Size to a struct decorated with InlineArrayAttribute now throws TypeLoadException.
- [FilePatternMatch.Stem changed to non-nullable](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/10.0/filepatternmatch-stem-nonnullable.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where FilePatternMatch.Stem property was changed from nullable to non-nullable.
- [GnuTarEntry and PaxTarEntry exclude atime and ctime by default](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/10.0/tar-atime-ctime-default.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where GnuTarEntry and PaxTarEntry no longer automatically set access time and change time fields.
- [LDAP DirectoryControl parsing is now more stringent](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/10.0/ldap-directorycontrol-parsing.md): Learn about the .NET 10 breaking change in core .NET libraries where LDAP DirectoryControl parsing is now more stringent.
- [MacCatalyst version normalization](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/10.0/maccatalyst-version-normalization.md): Learn about the .NET 10 breaking change in core .NET libraries where MacCatalyst version components are normalized.
- [No default termination signal handlers](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/10.0/sigterm-signal-handler.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where the runtime no longer provides a default termination signal handler.
- [System.Linq.AsyncEnumerable included in core libraries](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/10.0/asyncenumerable.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where the AsyncEnumerable class is now included.
